casebody.data:
IN RE ROBERT E. WHITTON REVOCABLE TRUST. Molly Michaluk, Petitioner-Appellant,
v.
Eddie Whitton and Richard Whitton, Successor Trustees of the Robert E. Whitton Revocable Trust, Respondents-Appellees. SC: 158408
COA: 337828 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 16, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of petitioner-appellant to extend the time for filing her supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 14, 2019.
